mapper.insert: INSERT INTO userRegisterTable(userRegisterId, userRegisterPassword, userRegisterRePassword, userRegisterName, userRegisterBirth, userRegisterGender, userRegisterEmail, userRegisterPhone1, userRegisterPhone2, userRegisterPhone3) VALUES(#{userRegisterId}, #{userRegisterPassword}, #{userRegisterRePassword}, #{userRegisterName}, #{userRegisterBirth}, #{userRegisterGender}, #{userRegisterEmail}, #{userRegisterPhone1}, #{userRegisterPhone2}, #{userRegisterPhone3})
mapper.select: SELECT userRegisterId FROM userRegisterTable WHERE userRegisterId = #{idOverlapCheck}
